message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $75, but I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we meet at $80? It's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $80, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
